content: miss fox hat pattern here 1 miss fox socks pattern here 2 set consists of knitted drops mittens hat and socks with fox pattern in alpaca drops extra 0-1217 drops design pattern no z-039-bn yarn group a mittens size 0/6 - 12/24 months 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/14 years materials drops alpaca from garnstudio 50 g for all sizes in color no 2925 rust 50 g for all sizes in color no 100 off white + some left-over black for eyes and mouth drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 5 - or size needed to get 26 sts x 34 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm worked in the round on double pointed needles 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/miss-fox-hat 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-1217-miss-fox-socks
